website_summaries.verdict: The Prevail Pro705 is Lexmark's all-purpose office machine and we recommend it for home offices or small workgroups; just don't expect it to print out high-quality graphics or high-resolution photos.
pros: The attractive Lexmark Prevail Pro705 bundles a useful set of features for the office crowd, including wireless connectivity, an autodocument feeder and duplexer, speed text out, and an impressive five-year warranty
cons: We don't expect an office-friendly printer to output studio-quality snapshots, but our graphics test document was not without quality flaws

customer_reviews.title: Super Printer
customer_reviews.text: This is my 3rd Lexmark printer. I love this printer - for the price it's fabulous. Lexmark makes consistantly outstanding products. The Pro705 functions are pervasive. Set-up is super easy - far easier and understandable than HP. I recently had to use Lexmark Cust. support on a previous printer. Although the support was foreign based, it was comprehensive and knowledgeable (and polite). My previous Lexmark printer was a victim of a power surge (I had the printer about 2 years). Lexmark replaced it at no charge. Now that's a good warranty!. Excellent customer support, very functional products at a good price - Products that work! Beat the competition, hands down! What's not to like?
customer_reviews.author: W. J. Magee

customer_reviews.title: Garbage
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this printer primarily because it is a wireless model. From the start it's integration to my home network was sporadic. Customer Service suggested updating the spooler. Improvement was brief at best. After about 5 months it stopped working wirelessly altogether. Now all 4 members of my family need to connect by USB for all print jobs. Additionally, this printer will not recognize any print cartridges other than the more expensive Lexmark cartridges. I find myself evaluating other printers for purchase only 9 months after buying this Lexmark. Regardless of reviews I am skipping the Lexmark brand.
customer_reviews.author: Ed

customer_reviews.title: Dont do it!
customer_reviews.text: Bought two of these printers for my office one year ago. Mine, when printing in color, now wants to color the entire page in virtually solid blue, or magenta. Spoke with their service dept and rec'd the typical...unplug the unit for 20 seconds, clean the printheads, bla bla bla. Still paints the page with very high priced ink. It now works only in black as I have eliminated the color settings. No positive response from their service dept regarding a replacement, but heck, its a year old and is disposable. Thought I would give lexmark a try but I would suggest something else.
customer_reviews.author: Mac

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price
customer_reviews.text: So far I haven't had any problems with this product. I also do not use it daily. The quality of the copies is excellent. It was fairly easy to set up and I am really not that great with computers. I think the thing that does bug me is the cost of replacing the ink cartridges-they are pretty expensive. Also, I think they should have better instructions on how to use the individual components, i.e fax, scanner. I had a paper jam and there were no instructions on how to handle it besides the confusing ones on the machine itself when it happened. Overall, it is a good buy at a reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: Noelea D'Antonio

customer_reviews.title: Wow, complete junk.
customer_reviews.text: We took a chance buying this before reading any reviews on this exact model - however, at the time the Prevail series was getting good reviews. Big mistake! This particular model printer has been nothing but trouble. Not only does it eat ink like there's no tomorrow, but the ink eventually leaked inside into the LCD button panel and the printer repeatedly issued printhead problems. We had an HP before this and it worked just fine. I would recommend Brother all in one over a Lexmark. Save your money and do not buy this one.
customer_reviews.author: ErikGoBlue

customer_reviews.title: A little hiccup with the hookup but an overall good printer.
customer_reviews.text: My Dell printer kicked the bucket after a paper jam. I found reviews for this Lexmark on CNET and it looked like the perfect printer for my home office. I love the fact that it has an "eco mode" which allows for double-sided printing and auto black and white. Also, the fax is easy to set up. If you follow the CD guide it will set up fairly easily. The only issue I had was that my computer wouldn't talk to the printer and Lexmark had a patch for that. Oh, and it won't print from Google Docs, a major issue for me. I plan on complaining to Lexmark until they create a patch.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer L. Aiksnoras

customer_reviews.title: Best printer ever bought
customer_reviews.text: This is my 4th printer in the last 4 years... Normally, I buy at Costco or Sams club... First time I bought it on Amazon.com as it was cheaper than the clubs. In the past, I bought Canon and HP printers... First time went with Lexmark... performance, efficiency, functionality east of set-up and use... all are beyond my expectations... The wireless works as far as my backyard. BTW, cent.com and other on-line reviews high rating prompted me to buy this product... and the best price prompted me to buy at amazon.com
customer_reviews.author: Krish

customer_reviews.title: Wireless function tempermental, cyan ink not printing, top scanner cover broke
customer_reviews.text: Since day one, wireless function was temperamental. Would not wake up from the save power feature. Two years into owning top cover hinge broke despite not using the scanner much. Now cyan ink will not print properly even after buying a new cartridge. Needless replacement of print head did not work. I do like the fact that it prints other inks even after out of other ink so you don't have to run to the store for ink replacement.
customer_reviews.author: kylady

customer_reviews.title: POS
customer_reviews.text: I hate this thing. I mean I hated this thing. It has been since replaced with a brother all in one. I bought it partially based on the warranty. Yup , that sucked too. It kept going off of the network and I finally got tired of the hassles. I found that unless you use this thing daily, the ink dried on the head and you will spend more time efing with it than it is worth. I am giving it 2 stars simply because when it works, it actually seemed to work well.
customer_reviews.author: Dawireman

customer_reviews.title: An Efficient Machine
customer_reviews.text: Excellent service offered by the representative because I was having problem connected the printer to my pc. Print quality is great and I like the fact that I don't have to use color ink when printing jobs that contain colors. Simple to use features and it is certainly great to print from any where in the house. Wonderful machine that I would certainly recommend to friends and family. Again, thanks for the wonderful customer service that was offered to me in my time of need.
customer_reviews.author: Marilyn DeGannes

customer_reviews.title: Beware the price tag; they make a lot of money on the ink.
customer_reviews.text: Several years into this machine and it is still as frustrating as the first week. Connectivity is inconsistent and unreliable; print cartridges are prohibitively expensive, and Lexmark put a lot of effort into locking out cheaper (and enviro-friendly) ink-replacement methods so the printer becomes useless if you run out of their expensive ink. YES, when working at its best, the quality is solid, but the machine doesn't overcome its problems to make it worthwhile. I'm done with Lexmark printers; looking forward to this one breaking more definitively so I can justify a different purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Danny Lesh

customer_reviews.title: Excellent printer
customer_reviews.text: Excellent printer so far. Very good print and copy quality. Set-up was complicated by the fact that the only instruction book sent was in french. Fortunately, a lot of the set-up was intuitive and we were able to get some questions answered online. The only downside so far is the paper drawer, which requires a bit of a "slam" to close once you've reloaded paper. It also makes it harder to use the back side of a sheet (for example to recycle old papers that were clean on one side). On the other hand, it has a nice 2 sided print feature, so there are not as many scrap one-sided sheets around to re-use.
customer_reviews.author: Mom of 3

customer_reviews.title: Greap Printer for the Price
customer_reviews.text: I got this printer at Amazon for about $130. It has all the nice funtions: print, copy, fax, and scan. There is a lot of great features. It was a piece of cake to install on a Pc. It was somewhat confusing for a Mac. I called tech support, and a representative took control of my Mac and did it for me. It was actually very easy. The printer itself isn't designed that great and it feels kind of cheap. However the price is amazing. It also uses XL cartridges to save money and ink. Also, Lexmark offers a great program for recycling ink cartridges. The printer comes with a 5 year warranty which is unheard of.
customer_reviews.author: Marco Chen

customer_reviews.title: Buyer beware!
customer_reviews.text: Product works ok, very slow, but ok for home use. Make sure to hold onto all of the product specific cables, which is a pain. The reason for the poor rating is that if you do not have all of the ink cartridges full, you can not print. So, if yellow runs out, you can not print a black and white document. What a sham!! I am sticking with HP in the future.
customer_reviews.author: JDS2525

customer_reviews.title: Lexmark Prevail Pro 705 Small Office Wireless
customer_reviews.text: Already had one I bought in 2009. Wanted a backup as mine is acting up. Had the newer models. Don't like them. Too complicated.
customer_reviews.author: peggyb

customer_reviews.title: Drinks Ink
customer_reviews.text: It seems to drink ink. I have to replace the cartridges ever month or so with little use. Will not print at all if one of the cartridges is low. Wish I'd spent more and got a better printer.
customer_reviews.author: M. B. Akins

customer_reviews.title: Mac Friendly Printer
customer_reviews.text: After having put up with, then finally getting fed up with, HP printers and all in ones, that had 250 page downloadable instruction manuals that never did work correctly, and continually with my Macs, it was a pleasant surprise to get a product that worked out of the box with my MacBook Pro and Lion. Instructions were to the point and well done. This printer also works well with PCs.
customer_reviews.author: surprised

customer_reviews.title: Nice printer, good price, a bit of an ink hog
customer_reviews.text: I am mostly happy with this printer. I like the closed paper tray. The access panel is convenient and intuitive. The features are good. I don't even mind the software. It is a little more of an ink hog than I had anticipated, but not the worst I've seen. At this price, I think this is a great printer for general lite home use.
customer_reviews.author: A Sanders

customer_reviews.title: Other than that it was a pretty decent printer
customer_reviews.text: Could never get it connected to wifi. Other than that it was a pretty decent printer.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick H.

customer_reviews.title: Costs too much for Ink
customer_reviews.text: If you don't print in color very often the ink dries up and when that happens it won't even print in black & white. If you try using cheap ink cartridges, either they won't be recognized or they leak all over the place.
customer_reviews.author: Jeana

customer_reviews.title: Overpriced ink taints this printer
customer_reviews.text: The printer quality is acceptable, but the ink prices are ridiculous and drive the rating to one star. Lexmark offers identical ink cartridges for $5.00 that cost $15-$20 for this printer - the only difference being an RFID chip that marks the printer as one that requires the user to pay more. Further the printer will not print at all if a user attempts to use ink from alternate vendors other than lexmark. I used to like the brand, but their ink practice has ended my use of their products.
customer_reviews.author: John Mudd

customer_reviews.title: Printer
customer_reviews.text: Ink does not last long. The network only works 25% of the time. We usually have to use the USB to print. It does not work at on on one of our laptops. It is noisy. It makes good copies when we get it to work or if the ink lasts.
customer_reviews.author: Kmw

customer_reviews.title: never really liked this printer
customer_reviews.text: Problem after problem with this printer. Print heads went bad shortly after using. Cartridges are very expensive. You can not print in just black, it uses color when you just want black...so stupid. This thing eats cartridges! Never will buy a Lexmark again.
customer_reviews.author: JOHN M. LAKE

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!!!!!!  A+++++++
customer_reviews.text: I am really enjoying my new lexmark printer. It has a ton of great options and is easy to install and use. I have had just one problem with documents getting stuck in the quece but when i called in to the customer service they were extremely helpful and just took over my computer and i haven't had a problem since. Lifetime customer support is a huge plus with any product and it has a 5 yr warranty so that was huge. Dont second guess buying this product. For the price it is the best all in one out there.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Montieth

customer_reviews.title: Have not successfully used item.
customer_reviews.text: I have been unable to pair this item via Bluetooth with my iPad 2. I purchased it used in very good condition but it did not come with disc. Also, I did load the Lexmark app onto my iPad. Lastly, I have had 3 paper jams. Hope it works when I get past Bluetooth issue.
customer_reviews.author: Love Nutrition

customer_reviews.title: Worst printer I've ever owned.
customer_reviews.text: What can I say? This printer hasn't worked properly since I got it out of the box. It worked just well enough for me not to return it. Not the return window is over it's not working at all. The ink carts it came with lasted about 12 printed pages before running dry. The wireless worked exactly twice. Now, even with a USB connection neither of my computers can communicate with it. This happened after changing nothing, none of the setting. Just inexplicably stopped being recognize by my computer. Stay away from this one.
customer_reviews.author: LL music

customer_reviews.title: Great printer
customer_reviews.text: This is a great printer. Very easy to set up. WiFi works great. Replaced a Dell printer which i had a lot of problems with WiFi work on it. This printer was a very good price for all the features.
customer_reviews.author: James H. Millican

customer_reviews.title: Never worked when i wanted it to
customer_reviews.text: Had it for more than 3 years and always gave problem when i wanted to use it urgently. Ink will dry, very slow over wireless. Lexmark support is good and replaced head, ink tray but again broke after few months latest problem is cannot detect ink catridge. I gave up and re-cycled it to purchase BW laser printer.
customer_reviews.author: J M P

customer_reviews.title: Lexmark replaces it over & over.
customer_reviews.text: What I think about this printer would be censored so, why bother.
customer_reviews.author: DG

customer_reviews.title: Terrible customer support
customer_reviews.text: The printer looked great, but never worked for me. I spent a total of 4 frustrating hours on the phone with customer support (overseas help desks). What was most frustrating, they would not listen/did not understand my reasons the printer did not work. Both times I called, I was promised that they would send me a new print head, but they never did. Amazon treated me well and took back the printer, but I will never buy another Lexmark machine. The 5-year warranty is worthless if you cannot get any help.
customer_reviews.author: trrez

customer_reviews.title: great price for a great printer
customer_reviews.text: Needed a new printer and partial to lexmark...I made a very good decision on this one! Setup was a piece of cake and it works with NO glitches. Pics and documents print perfect! Thanks Lexmark for a super inexpensive printer and thanks Amazon for making the purchasing easy!
customer_reviews.author: dmullins7501

customer_reviews.title: Could be a little faster.....
customer_reviews.text: Although I like this printer so far...I think it could be a little faster in getting ready in process before it prints what ever your printing..Other than that right now I can't tell you much more,,,for I have only had it for about a month....
customer_reviews.author: Spanman

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good printer. Only drawback is the amount of ink used in everyday printing and the cost of replacement ink.
customer_reviews.author: John R

customer_reviews.title: lexmark printer
customer_reviews.text: Its the best printer ever. Its also my 6th printer in twenty years.Having a minor issue after using it over a month- it began to have a delay in printing. What it takes normally to print immediately, now it delays for 15-30 seconds then begin to print.I wonder whats causing the problem( its was instantaneous for the first month). Wonder if anyone else have the same issues.....
customer_reviews.author: baysby

customer_reviews.title: Great Solution!
customer_reviews.text: Printer was very easy to setup. only problem I had was I needed to download the Windows7 driver for installation. Everything else works great. I even love the Lexmark ink exchange program.
customer_reviews.author: A. Hochron

customer_reviews.title: Best All-N-One Printer that I have ever owned
customer_reviews.text: This printer does it all, I am still finding things that this printer does, and for the price, it is unbeatable, and it also comes with a 3 year warranty that you can upgrade to a 5 year warranty. My last all-n-one printers were Hp and compact, both of them were crappy! This printer does things like double-sided printing, things that you would have to buy an expensive office style printer to do, or reinsert your paper back into the tray on the proper side to do...
customer_reviews.author: R.W.

customer_reviews.title: Great Printer
customer_reviews.text: Great printer. Had some difficulty in set up. Initially there were some issues with the wireless connection. Once the kinks were worked out with the connection, we have had no problems. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: ETBob

customer_reviews.title: Nice product
customer_reviews.text: I really like this all in one. Wireless setup was a little tricky, but it now works very reliably. I should have given up on HP years ago.
customer_reviews.author: Grandpa

customer_reviews.title: Small Amount of Ink
customer_reviews.text: I try to print in black, music which is all black and this printer uses several colors for black & white printing. It does that so that you have to buy more ink cartages. I've printed no more than 60 to 70 pages, all black and white and the crayan ink cartridge is empty. The printer will not print until I replace this cartridge. IT'S A RIP OFF BIG TIME!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Douglas L Autrey

customer_reviews.title: Best Printer Ever Had, Beats HP Any day!!!
customer_reviews.text: Hate the network set-up process but otherwise thoroughly enjoy my new printer! Especially the duplex feature. Highly recommend this printer, especially for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Space Cadet

customer_reviews.title: Excellent machine
customer_reviews.text: This machine is far and again better than the Epson Stylus Scan we had. Obviously more features and worked easily right out of the box. No problems so far, though we haven't done much in picture copying. My wife finds it very suitable for her business at home. I was surprised that it will not print wireless from a computer. I was hoping to leave open a USB port but not so.
customer_reviews.author: DAVE

customer_reviews.title: Best buy from AMAZON!!!
customer_reviews.text: For years i had an HP three in one but when it broke after almost 8-10 years after reading the consumers ratings for this product i decided to buy it. I love buying from amazon found it at an amazing price saved over $100 !! Great great product !! Vicky
customer_reviews.author: Vasiliki Russo

customer_reviews.title: User friendly.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for a home office use. So far I love it. This is my first experience with Wi-Fi and it is great. Sitting in my living room and hitting the print button and know that this printer is doing it's work in the office is fantastic. It's easy to use and always has a great print job. Just can't ask for anything else.
customer_reviews.author: Nellie Evans

customer_reviews.title: Lexmark Pro 705
customer_reviews.text: WORKS GOOD, A LITTLE BIG, FRONT LOADING, I LIKE THAT, SIMPLE TO USE. I would recommend it to others fer sur.
customer_reviews.author: Bob H

customer_reviews.title: 5 Star Printer at REASONABLE PRICE !!
customer_reviews.text: Got this printer at Amazon.com, been using it for almost a month now, so far, its flawless. I'm very happy with it. set-up is very easy, works well with my window 7. perfect for small business.
customer_reviews.author: Sam G.

customer_reviews.title: great printer but very expensive ink
customer_reviews.text: even 100xl cartridge wont save you, it is very expensive to buy the ink compared to brother printer or HP, no cartridge refill, it is cheaper for me to buy new brother printer with its cheap ink cartridge the photos printink however is great, the printer is amazing but the only problem is the ink
customer_reviews.author: dent

customer_reviews.title: A lot of bang for the buck
customer_reviews.text: Wanted something a little more robust than a typical "home" all-in-one printer. This one delivers. Love the wireless function. Connected to 4 printers no wires. Can even print e-mail from iPhone with a hack. No reliablilty issues so far. Print quality is very good. Color scanning is a plus.
customer_reviews.author: Mr Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Lexmark Prevail Pro705 is highly recommended.
customer_reviews.text: I found the Lexmark Pro705 to be very easy to install and to perform reliably with all the features I need. I especially appreciate the wireless functioning and the fax receiving feature, using the same phone number on which I receive landline calls.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Good deal!
customer_reviews.text: This printer has been good so far. I like the wireless, autofeed, and 2 sided prints. Deffinately a time saver. The only thing I don't like is that I can't print off docs from my iPad on it yet. You can pirint pics though. Overall it works well for what I need.
customer_reviews.author: Jdavis

customer_reviews.title: Lexmark wireless printer
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Installation was easy on XP. I may print 1 to 2 Prints a day and so far I had no problem, quality is great and wireless option is the most easy way to print. Cons: could not install on win7 OS, tried several time with no success.
customer_reviews.author: Parviz Ghofrany

customer_reviews.title: Printer
customer_reviews.text: This printer is just ok for me. I think the ink should last longer than it does. Purchased 2 of them. Printing quality is good though.
customer_reviews.author: Rita Henderson

customer_reviews.title: Great Price and service.
customer_reviews.text: Am very pleased with my new printer. It is replacing an H.P., which always gave me trouble. I completed a survey with Lexmark, and rated the printer very highly. This is not my first purchse from Amazon, and it certainly won't be the last. Each and every time I have been very happy with the service and rates. Amazon is my online store of choice. Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: C. L. C.

customer_reviews.title: EASY!
customer_reviews.text: I can sum it up in just a few words. Simple-ease of set up Value- got it at a price cheaper than local stores Great- quality of pic prints and duplex printing WOW-easy wifi scanning and printing...
customer_reviews.author: K. Richardson

customer_reviews.title: Happy with Purchase
customer_reviews.text: This product so far has performed as stated. I had to have a fax machine that would work with VOip and this does so, splendidly. It's a little noisy at first, but then calms down. Terrific product and price for an all in one.
customer_reviews.author: Julie M Bright

customer_reviews.title: Lexmark printer review
customer_reviews.text: I had an HP but it was a DOG. At about 9 months I just threw it away. The Lexmark 705 was priced right and arrived a day ahead of schedule. It was easy to set up and the telephone help was excellent. It is quiet, fast and totally unobtrusive. The difference between it and my previous printer is astounding. This is our second Lexmark and we're happy with both of them.
customer_reviews.author: Hank Trisler

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your time, plus Adorama won't accept return
customer_reviews.text: Worst print quality of any printer I've seen. Print head failed after two (2) prints. Had to replace it. Adorama won't accept returns if ink has been installed. Geez, I was aware this was a cheap printer but crappy too? That's too much.
customer_reviews.author: gthones

customer_reviews.title: Lexmark printer
customer_reviews.text: Great printer for the price! I typically would rather spend more money to make sure I get a great product, but here I spent less money and still felt like I received a great product.
customer_reviews.author: 1234sara

customer_reviews.title: Excellent printer!
customer_reviews.text: The printer is very good! It is smaller than my previous HP one and quite easy to install. The printing is fast.
customer_reviews.author: J. Zhang

customer_reviews.title: do not buy
customer_reviews.text: top jams and will not feed paper. happens at least once a week. have traded it in for a brother
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Paul Feddon
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product I have two of them one for me and the one I just bought for my wife.Con't beat it.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Feddon

customer_reviews.title: I like it
customer_reviews.text: I found this printer pretty easy to setup and has been operating very well for me so far.
customer_reviews.author: M. Goldberg

customer_reviews.title: The best Lexmark printer yet
customer_reviews.text: This printer was easy to set up and is wonderful to use. I have not yet used all its features, but will check them out after the holidays. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Mammer Jammer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Value
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this unit on a referral from a friend and I am very happy with it. It was easy to set up including the wireless network printing. Highly receommended for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Joseph O. Hollomon III

product_meta.title: Lexmark Prevail Pro705 Small Office Wireless Multifunction Inkjet Printer
product_meta.description:
Put the robust Lexmark Prevail Pro705 Wireless All-in-One with Fax to work for your home or small office. Experience greater freedom with WiFi-n (3X better wireless coverage and faster transfer speeds) or connect via Ethernet. Be more productive with built-in full feature fax, and a large, 50-page auto document feeder to easily handle printing, scanning, copying and faxing jobs. Installation is fast and easy – requiring approximately 10 minutes, while WiFi Protected Setup allows you to sync the printer to a WPS-enabled router with the touch of a button. The Prevail Pro705 also features a 2.4” color LCD to easily view and enhance photos. The Eco Mode feature includes an energy-saving feature and automatic two-sided printing, which can cut paper consumption in half. Print fast with document speeds up to 33ppm and 4”x6” photo printing in as little as 24 seconds. This robust All-in-One ships with XL high-yield ink cartridges which use Lexmark’s own Vizix ink technology to produce clear and consistent results. The Vizix ink system uses individual cartridges which can be replaced one color at a time. The Prevail Pro705 also ships with Business Card Scanning software which lets you scan up to eight cards at once, parcel the information, and synchronize it with many popular contact management solutions. All of this functionality is backed by an industry leading 5-year warranty and lifetime, priority phone support!

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
The Lexmark Prevail Pro705 Small Office Wireless 4-in-1 offers business class performance at an affordable price. This robust office 4-in-1 printer/copier/scanner/fax provides advanced connectivity and paper handling capabilities for improved efficiency. It also saves you time and money with Vizix ink technology for crisp text and vivid images, automatic two-sided printing, and individual ink cartridges. 



Print, Copy, Scan, and Fax with Outstanding Results
Designed to tackle a range of jobs quickly and efficiently, the Lexmark Prevail Pro705 Small Office Wireless 4-in-1, winner of Bertl's Best Cost-Effective All-in-One Device Award, combines a range of functions in one compact, space-saving unit. Finish urgent print jobs with speeds up to 33 ppm (pages per minute) and handle large scan and copy jobs easily with the 50-page automatic document feeder. Enhance and view photos with the vibrant 2.4-inch color LCD and then print them in just 24 seconds, and improve office communication with the full feature fax with 99 speed dials, junk fax block, and caller ID. And because this unit is Energy Star qualified, you'll save money and help the environment.

Tomorrow's Wireless Technology Today
With the Prevail Pro705, you can print from wherever you want without being confined to the printer's location. A fast and easy wireless installation allows multiple users to print from virtually anywhere in the home or office. Wherever you have a signal, you can print. 

Additionally, the printer's WiFi-n connection provides up to three times the coverage of traditional wireless networks, and its quick transfer speeds ensure that your print jobs will always get through. 

Large Capacity and Two-Sided Printing Saves Resources
Spend more time managing success, and less time managing paper supply, with 150-page input capacity and a 50-page automatic document feeder. You'll also save both money and resources with one-touch automatic two-sided printing and the included high yield XL black ink cartridge (also included are standard-yield cyan, magenta, and yellow ink cartridges). 

Scan and Import Business Cards
Stay organized and keep in touch with all your contacts thanks to advanced technology that allows you to easily scan and save information from business cards, such as name, address, and phone number. Rather than entering the information manually, you can scan up to eight cards at a time and sync it with your address book software. This saves you time and keeps your business running smoothly.

Go Green Automatically
To help save energy costs, the Prevail Pro705 is Energy Star qualified, which means it meets rigorous requirements for energy set by the U.S. Environmental Protection Agency and the U.S. Department of Energy. And because it uses less energy, it can help lower your utility bills so you save money. 

To save up to 50-percent on paper and 8-percent on energy costs, this unit also offers automatic two-sided printing and an eco mode that's accessible with one touch. 

Warranty Information
The Prevail Pro705 is backed by an industry best five-year warranty (registration within 90 days required). 

What's in the Box
Lexmark Prevail Pro705 Small Office Wireless 4-in-1; print head; XL black ink cartridge, and one each standard-yield cyan, magenta, and yellow ink cartridges; quick setup sheet; installation software on CD-ROM; quick reference guide; fax guide; networking guide; power supply and cord; USB cable; service information; and warranty card.

 Printing in draft mode and excluding time to first page print. Visit www.lexmark.com for details.

feature_bullets: Wireless printing—802.11n wireless network and Ethernet compatibility offer the fastest speeds and longest range and give customers the freedom to print from virtually anywhere within the building and the flexibility to print from multiple computers.
Lexmark's industry-leading five year warranty with lifetime, priority technical support provides peace of mind.
Eco Mode includes an energy-saving feature and automatic two-sided printing, which can cut paper consumption in half.
50 page automatic document feeder easily handles large printing, scanning, copying, and fax jobs.
High yield individual ink cartridges allow customers to replace only the ink that is needed. XL cartridges with 3x the ink of standard cartridges are included.
